title: i can't change my gmail address
body: My verification email does not receive a verification password

replies.body:
Have you checked your spam or filtered folders for the email? If you still aren't seeing it, hit us up in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be happy to work with you to sort this out.

Let me know if you run into issues submitting your ticket.
